original_text: I am the God who appeared to you at Bethel. That is where you poured oil on the special stone and you made a promise to me. Now I am telling you to leave this land. Go back to the land where you were born.” ’
korean_text: 나는 벧엘의 하나님이라 네가 거기서 기둥에 기름을 붓고 거기서 내게 서원하였으니 지금 일어나 이 곳을 떠나서 네 출생지로 돌아가라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: who appeared to you at Bethel
That is where you poured oil on the special stone
and you made a promise to me
Go back to the land where you were born
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 본토 즉 너의 친척에게로 돌아가라
